bondPriceInUSD(address).notice: converts bond price to DAI value

debtDecay(address).notice: amount to decay total debt by

debtRatio(address).notice: calculate current ratio of debt to Necc supply

payoutFor(uint256,address).notice: calculate interest due for new bond

pendingPayoutFor(address,address).notice: calculate amount of Necc available for claim by depositor

percentVestedFor(address,address).notice: calculate how far into vesting a depositor is

standardizedDebtRatio(address).notice: debt ratio in same terms for reserve or liquidity bonds
